column2: Default behaviour, the council power faction is enabled
The council power faction will never declare war if you refuse demands and will apply an opinion penalty
The council power faction is completly disabled

[From.GetTitledName] has unfortunately declined to give the [Root.GetCouncilName] more powers in deciding the policies of the realm. But your valuable support in this matter will not be forgotten.

Sincerely,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
Vanilla behaviour, independence factions will not occur for dejure same culture and religion vassals
Independence factions now have a chance to form from dejure vassals
Vanilla behaviour, council members cannot join factions when council is content
Council members can join factions even when council is content but at a reduced chance
With the weakened state of your liege, you and the rest of your friends in the independence faction have forced your independence
Vanilla behaviour no extra loss of vassals can occur
Any lost faction/revolt war will cause current members of the independence faction to turn independent
Any lost war will cause current members of the independence faction to turn independent
Any lost war will let any vassal decide whether to stay or break away from the liege
With the weakend state of your liege now could be the time to break away from your liege
Do it! My liege has no mastery of me
